de.mbrero.see.api

Class GoldStandardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mbrero.see.api.GoldStandardController

  • public class GoldStandardController
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses the Goldstandard and saves the annotations to the database and creates a qrel File for the TREC tool
    Author:
    massimiliano.brero@studium.fernuni-hagen.de

      • persistGoldStanstandard

        public void persistGoldStanstandard()
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Manages complete Job. Extracts the annotations from the files in the given path and saves them to the database and creates a qrel File for the TREC tool evaluation.
